A currated collection of content learning machine learning

Data is the new oil, and a lot of information and code is free. This site is aimed at tying a lot of the resources together into a learning journey.

The key concepts:

  • Complete basics of machine learning
  • Loading data files (CSVs) in python
  • Manipulating CSVs in python
  • Your first models - the Kaggle's Titanic problem
